title: Weeding Made Easy - Year Round Mulch Garden

tasks.task: Maintaining a year-round mulch method garden
subtasks: Harvesting hay from the garden
Applying hay mulch to weed-infested areas
Observing weed growth and managing emergence
Verifying the effectiveness of mulch in weed suppression

tasks.task: Managing weeds in a mulch garden
subtasks: Identifying weed growth through visual inspection
Collecting hay from designated garden areas
Distributing hay mulch directly over weeds
Monitoring the duration necessary for weed death
Identifying hay sources within the garden
Gathering hay from those sources
Transporting hay to the designated application area
Selecting appropriate hay for mulching
Scattering hay over the weed areas
Ensuring even distribution of mulch
Regularly checking mulched areas for weed growth
Confirming the mulch's effectiveness in killing weeds
Adjusting mulch application as needed for optimal results
